arg.jname: ボタン名 (日本語、省略可)

arg.name: arg 1
arg.jname: ボタン名 (日本語、省略可)

params.sqlcmd: "select " +" FncGetFormattedDatetime(T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"PUCH_ODR_START_DATE\\") as \\"PUCH_ODR_START_DATE\\", " +" FncGetFormattedDatetime(T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"PUCH_ODR_DLV_DATE\\") as \\"PUCH_ODR_DLV_DATE\\", " +" T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"VEND_CD\\" as \\"VEND_CD\\", " +" M_VEND_CTRL.\\"VEND_ANAME\\" as \\"VEND_ANAME\\", " +" T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"ITEM_CD\\" as \\"ITEM_CD\\", " +" decode(T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"NON_NO_ITEM_FLG\\", 0, M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_NAME\\", T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"NON_NO_ITEM_NAME\\") as \\"ITEM_NAME\\", " +" to_char(T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"PUCH_ODR_QTY\\", 'fm999999999999999990.0999') as \\"PUCH_ODR_QTY\\", " +" decode(T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"NON_NO_ITEM_FLG\\", 0, M_ITEM.\\"STOCK_UNIT\\", T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"NON_NO_ITEM_PUCH_ODR_UNIT\\") as \\"STOCK_UNIT\\", " +" T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"PUCH_ODR_CD\\" as \\"PUCH_ODR_CD\\", " +" T_OD.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\" as \\"JOB_ODR_CD\\", " +" to_char(T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"PUCH_ODR_SLIP_ISS_DATE\\", 'YYYY/MM/DD') as \\"PUCH_ODR_SLIP_ISS_DATE\\", " +" to_char(T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\") as \\"MODIFY_COUNT\\", " +" T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"PUCH_ODR_INST_SLIP_ISS_FLG\\" as \\"PUCH_ODR_INST_SLIP_ISS_FLG\\" " +"from " +" T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR, " +" M_VEND_CTRL, " +" M_ITEM, " +" T_OD " +"where " +" T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.COMPANY_CD = M_VEND_CTRL.COMPANY_CD(+) " +" and T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.VEND_CD = M_VEND_CTRL.VEND_CD(+) " +" and T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.OD_NO = T_OD.OD_NO(+) " +" and T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.ITEM_CD = M_ITEM.ITEM_CD(+) " +" and T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"PUCH_ODR_START_DATE\\" <= to_date(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') " +" and T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"PUCH_ODR_DLV_DATE\\" <= to_date(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') " +" and T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"PUCH_ODR_CD\\" <= ? " +" and T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"VEND_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"PUCH_ODR_PERSON\\" = ? " +" and T_OD.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\" like ? " +" and T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"PUCH_ODR_STS_TYP\\" = 2 " +" and T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"PUCH_ODR_INST_SLIP_ISS_FLG\\" = ? " +" and M_VEND_CTRL.ODR_FORM_FLG = ? " +"order by " +" T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"PUCH_ODR_START_DATE\\", " +" T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"PUCH_ODR_DLV_DATE\\", " +" T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"PUCH_ODR_CD\\""

"select " +" to_char(T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"PUCH_ODR_INST_SLIP_ISS_FLG\\") as \\"PUCH_ODR_INST_SLIP_ISS_FLG\\", " +" T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"PUCH_ODR_CD\\" as \\"PUCH_ODR_CD\\", " +" to_char(SYS_DATE_CTRL.\\"BUSINESS_OPR_DATE\\", 'YYYY/MM/DD') as \\"BUSINESS_OPR_DATE\\", " +" M_VEND_CTRL.\\"VEND_NAME\\" as \\"VEND_NAME\\", " +" M_VEND_CTRL.\\"ZIP_CD\\" as \\"ZIP_CD\\", " +" M_VEND_CTRL.\\"ADDRESS_1\\" as \\"ADDRESS_1\\", " +" M_VEND_CTRL.\\"ADDRESS_2\\" as \\"ADDRESS_2\\", " +" M_VEND_CTRL.\\"VEND_ORG\\" as \\"VEND_ORG\\", " +" M_VEND_CTRL.\\"VEND_PERSON\\" as \\"VEND_PERSON\\", " +" M_VEND_CTRL.\\"TEL\\" as \\"TEL\\", " +" M_VEND_CTRL.\\"FAX\\" as \\"FAX\\", " +" T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"ITEM_CD\\" as \\"ITEM_CD\\", " +" decode(T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"NON_NO_ITEM_FLG\\", 0, M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_NAME\\", T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"NON_NO_ITEM_NAME\\") as \\"ITEM_NAME\\", " +" T_OD.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\" as \\"JOB_ODR_CD\\", " +" to_char(T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"PUCH_ODR_QTY\\") as \\"PUCH_ODR_QTY\\", " +" decode(T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"NON_NO_ITEM_FLG\\", 0, M_ITEM.\\"STOCK_UNIT\\", T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"NON_NO_ITEM_PUCH_ODR_UNIT\\") as \\"STOCK_UNIT\\", " +" to_char(decode(T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"NON_NO_ITEM_FLG\\", 0, decode(M_ITEM.\\"STOCK_UNIT_FLG\\", 1, trunc(T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"PUCH_ODR_QTY\\" / M_ITEM.\\"PKG_UNIT_QTY\\"), 0), 0)) as \\"PKG_QTY\\", " +" to_char(decode(T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"NON_NO_ITEM_FLG\\", 0, decode(M_ITEM.\\"STOCK_UNIT_FLG\\", 1, mod(T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"PUCH_ODR_QTY\\", M_ITEM.\\"PKG_UNIT_QTY\\"), 0), 0)) as \\"PKG_ODD_QTY\\", " +" decode(T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"NON_NO_ITEM_FLG\\", 0, decode(M_ITEM.\\"STOCK_UNIT_FLG\\", 1, M_ITEM.\\"PKG_UNIT\\", NULL), NULL) as \\"PKG_UNIT\\", " +" decode(T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"NON_NO_ITEM_FLG\\", 0, decode(M_ITEM.\\"STOCK_UNIT_FLG\\", 1, M_ITEM.\\"STOCK_UNIT\\", NULL), NULL) as \\"STOCK_UNIT2\\", " +" to_char(T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"PUCH_ODR_START_DATE\\", 'YYYY/MM/DD') as \\"PUCH_ODR_START_DATE\\", " +" to_char(T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"PUCH_ODR_DLV_DATE\\", 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') as \\"PUCH_ODR_DLV_DATE\\", " +" to_char(T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"UNIT_COST\\") as \\"UNIT_COST\\", " +" VEND_CUR.\\"CUR_UNIT\\" as \\"VEND_CUR_UNIT\\", " +" to_char(T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"PUCH_ODR_AMOUNT\\") as \\"PUCH_ODR_AMOUNT\\", " +" to_char(T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"DISC_AMOUNT\\") as \\"DISC_AMOUNT\\", " +" to_char(T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"NET_AMOUNT\\") as \\"NET_AMOUNT\\", " +" to_char(T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"TAX_AMOUNT_1\\" + T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"TAX_AMOUNT_2\\" + T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"TAX_AMOUNT_3\\") as \\"TAX_AMOUNT\\", " +" to_char(T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"AMOUNT_INCLUDE_TAX\\") as \\"AMOUNT_INCLUDE_TAX\\", " +" to_char(T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"HOME_CUR_AMOUNT\\") as \\"HOME_CUR_AMOUNT\\", " +" HOME_CUR.\\"CUR_UNIT\\" as \\"HOME_CUR_UNIT\\", " +" VEND_CUR.\\"CUR_NAME\\" as \\"CUR_NAME\\", " +" M_VEND_CTRL.\\"EXCH_TYP\\" as \\"DISPLAY_NAME\\", " +" to_char(T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"RATE_JUDGE_DATE\\", 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') as \\"RATE_JUDGE_DATE\\", " +" to_char(T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"EXCH_RATE\\") as \\"EXCH_RATE\\", " +" to_char(T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"PROCESSING_COST\\") as \\"PROCESSING_COST\\", " +" to_char(T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"MATERIAL_COST\\") as \\"MATERIAL_COST\\", " +" to_char(T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"OTHER_OVERHEADS\\") as \\"OTHER_OVERHEADS\\", " +" T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"PUCH_ODR_COMMENT\\" as \\"PUCH_ODR_COMMENT\\", " +" M_PLANT.\\"PLANT_NAME\\" as \\"PLANT_NAME\\", " +" M_WH.\\"WH_NAME\\" as \\"WH_NAME\\", " +" M_PLANT.\\"ZIP_CD\\" as \\"WH_ZIP_CD\\", " +" M_PLANT.\\"ADDRESS_1\\" as \\"WH_ADDRESS_1\\", " +" M_PLANT.\\"ADDRESS_2\\" as \\"WH_ADDRESS_2\\", " +" M_PLANT.\\"TEL\\" as \\"WH_TEL\\", " +" decode(USER_MST.\\"USER_NAME\\", NULL, T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"PUCH_ODR_PERSON\\", USER_MST.\\"USER_NAME\\") as \\"USER_NAME\\" " +"from " +" T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR, " +" M_VEND_CTRL, " +" SYS_DATE_CTRL, " +" M_ITEM, " +" T_OD, " +" M_PLANT, " +" M_WH, " +" USER_MST, " +" M_CUR VEND_CUR, " +" ( " +" select " +" M_CUR.CUR_UNIT " +" from " +" M_CUR, " +" SYS_HOME_CUR " +" where " +" SYS_HOME_CUR.HOME_CUR_CD = M_CUR.CUR_CD(+) " +" and SYS_HOME_CUR.CTRL_CD = 'SYSTEM' " +" ) HOME_CUR " +"where " +" T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.ITEM_CD = M_ITEM.ITEM_CD(+) " +" and T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.PLANT_CD = M_PLANT.PLANT_CD(+) " +" and T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.COMPANY_CD = M_VEND_CTRL.COMPANY_CD(+) " +" and T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.VEND_CD = M_VEND_CTRL.VEND_CD(+) " +" and T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.WH_CD = M_WH.WH_CD(+) " +" and T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.PLANT_CD = SYS_DATE_CTRL.PLANT_CD(+) " +" and T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.OD_NO = T_OD.OD_NO(+) " +" and T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.PUCH_ODR_PERSON = USER_MST.USER_CD(+) " +" and M_VEND_CTRL.CUR_CD = VEND_CUR.CUR_CD(+) " +" and T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"PUCH_ODR_CD\\" = ?"
"select " +" to_char(T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\") as MODIFY_COUNT " +"from " +" T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR " +"where " +" T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"PUCH_ODR_CD\\" = ? " +"for update nowait"
"select " +" M_CUR.CUR_UNIT " +"from " +" M_CUR, " +" SYS_HOME_CUR " +"where " +" SYS_HOME_CUR.HOME_CUR_CD = M_CUR.CUR_CD(+) " +" and SYS_HOME_CUR.CTRL_CD = 'SYSTEM'"

"select " +" count(1) " +"from " +" T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR, " +" M_VEND_CTRL, " +" M_ITEM, " +" T_OD " +"where " +" T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.COMPANY_CD = M_VEND_CTRL.COMPANY_CD(+) " +" and T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.VEND_CD = M_VEND_CTRL.VEND_CD(+) " +" and T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.OD_NO = T_OD.OD_NO(+) " +" and T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.ITEM_CD = M_ITEM.ITEM_CD(+) " +" and T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"PUCH_ODR_START_DATE\\" <= to_date(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') " +" and T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"PUCH_ODR_DLV_DATE\\" <= to_date(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') " +" and T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"PUCH_ODR_CD\\" <= ? " +" and T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"VEND_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"PUCH_ODR_PERSON\\" = ? " +" and T_OD.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\" like ? " +" and T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"PUCH_ODR_STS_TYP\\" = 2 " +" and T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"PUCH_ODR_INST_SLIP_ISS_FLG\\" = ? " +" and M_VEND_CTRL.ODR_FORM_FLG = ? " +" and ROWNUM <= TO_NUMBER(?) + 1"

"select " +" FncGetFormattedDatetime(T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"PUCH_ODR_START_DATE\\") as \\"PUCH_ODR_START_DATE\\", " +" FncGetFormattedDatetime(T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"PUCH_ODR_DLV_DATE\\") as \\"PUCH_ODR_DLV_DATE\\", " +" T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"VEND_CD\\" as \\"VEND_CD\\", " +" M_VEND_CTRL.\\"VEND_ANAME\\" as \\"VEND_ANAME\\", " +" T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"ITEM_CD\\" as \\"ITEM_CD\\", " +" decode(T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"NON_NO_ITEM_FLG\\", 0, M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_NAME\\", T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"NON_NO_ITEM_NAME\\") as \\"ITEM_NAME\\", " +" to_char(T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"PUCH_ODR_QTY\\", 'fm999999999999999990.0999') as \\"PUCH_ODR_QTY\\", " +" decode(T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"NON_NO_ITEM_FLG\\", 0, M_ITEM.\\"STOCK_UNIT\\", T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"NON_NO_ITEM_PUCH_ODR_UNIT\\") as \\"STOCK_UNIT\\", " +" T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"PUCH_ODR_CD\\" as \\"PUCH_ODR_CD\\", " +" T_OD.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\" as \\"JOB_ODR_CD\\", " +" to_char(T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"PUCH_ODR_SLIP_ISS_DATE\\", 'YYYY/MM/DD') as \\"PUCH_ODR_SLIP_ISS_DATE\\", " +" to_char(T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\") as \\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" " +"from " +" T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR, " +" M_VEND_CTRL, " +" M_ITEM, " +" T_OD, " +" (SELECT " +" SUM(ACPT_QTY) ACPT_QTY, " +" PUCH_ODR_CD " +" FROM " +" T_ACPT_RSLT " +" GROUP BY PUCH_ODR_CD " +" ) TAR " +"where " +" T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.COMPANY_CD = M_VEND_CTRL.COMPANY_CD(+) " +" and T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.VEND_CD = M_VEND_CTRL.VEND_CD(+) " +" and T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.OD_NO = T_OD.OD_NO(+) " +" and T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.ITEM_CD = M_ITEM.ITEM_CD(+) " +" and T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.PUCH_ODR_CD = TAR.PUCH_ODR_CD(+) " +" and T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.PUCH_ODR_QTY > TAR.ACPT_QTY " +" and T_OD.JOB_ODR_CANCEL_NO(+) = '0' " +" and T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"PUCH_ODR_START_DATE\\" <= to_date(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') " +" and T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"PUCH_ODR_DLV_DATE\\" <= to_date(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') " +" and T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"PUCH_ODR_CD\\" <= ? " +" and T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"VEND_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"PUCH_ODR_PERSON\\" = ? " +" and T_OD.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\" like ? " +" and T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"PUCH_ODR_STS_TYP\\" = 2 " +" and T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"PARTIAL_DELIV_SLIP_ISS_FLG\\" = ? " +"order by " +" T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"PUCH_ODR_START_DATE\\", " +" T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"PUCH_ODR_DLV_DATE\\", " +" T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"PUCH_ODR_CD\\""

"select " +" count(1) " +"from " +" T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR, " +" M_VEND_CTRL, " +" M_ITEM, " +" T_OD, " +"(SELECT " +" SUM(ACPT_QTY) ACPT_QTY, " +" PUCH_ODR_CD " +" FROM " +" T_ACPT_RSLT " +" GROUP BY PUCH_ODR_CD " +" ) TAR " +"where " +" T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.COMPANY_CD = M_VEND_CTRL.COMPANY_CD(+) " +" and T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.VEND_CD = M_VEND_CTRL.VEND_CD(+) " +" and T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.OD_NO = T_OD.OD_NO(+) " +" and T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.ITEM_CD = M_ITEM.ITEM_CD(+) " +" and T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.PUCH_ODR_CD = TAR.PUCH_ODR_CD(+) " +" and T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.PUCH_ODR_QTY > TAR.ACPT_QTY " +" and T_OD.JOB_ODR_CANCEL_NO(+) = '0' " +" and T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"PUCH_ODR_START_DATE\\" <= to_date(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') " +" and T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"PUCH_ODR_DLV_DATE\\" <= to_date(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') " +" and T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"PUCH_ODR_CD\\" <= ? " +" and T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"VEND_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"PUCH_ODR_PERSON\\" = ? " +" and T_OD.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\" like ? " +" and T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"PUCH_ODR_STS_TYP\\" = 2 " +" and T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"PARTIAL_DELIV_SLIP_ISS_FLG\\" = ? " +" and ROWNUM <= TO_NUMBER(?) + 1"
